name: Take to the Skies
description:
A local doughnut stand has been giving away free doughnuts all day, and people have left them all over the park grass! For shame.

Unbeknownst to them, the sugar has seeped into the soil and awoken nests of an unknown species of insect!

Fight as a newly awoken colony and dominate this opportunity to gather such a nutritious source of energy.

Controls

Left click doughnuts to buy nodes (150 sugar)

Press R to buy worker bugs (15 sugar)

Press T to create an army of flying bugs (300 sugar)
